title: Wasteland
description: Angelo Marchetti is dead. However, death is not the end for the mafia hitman, but rather a doorway into a harsh frontier otherwise known as the Wasteland. Armed with just his Elitario training and signature tools of the killing trade, he must confront the forces of darkness in order to survive.Lost upon the flat tundra of a frozen wilderness, he traverses the barren plateau to a small ghost-like-town named “Boondocks.” There, the hitman avails a saloon for shelter and knowledge of how he might return to the living-world. However, the price of earning that knowledge along with its salvation might just condemn his soul for all eternity.
author: Keith Crews
